text: P. Lond.Lit.207 (BL P.Inv.Nr.230, TM 62310 / LDAB 3473) is a Greek fragment of a Septuagint manuscript written on papyrus in codex form. This manuscript discovered at Fayum, contains parts of the Book of Psalms. Palaeographycally it is dated to late third century or early fourth century (250 - 350 CE).. == References == Category:3rd-century biblical manuscripts Category:4th-century biblical manuscripts Category:Septuagint manuscripts
title: P. Lond.Lit.207
